website_summaries.verdict: The versatile palmtop-size AAXA ST200 pico projector runs on batteries and provides a good range of connection choices, but suffers from some performance issues.
pros: Can run media files from a USB key or microSD card
cons: Tiny focus wheel is tricky to use
Image size for comfortable viewing is small for its rated brightness
Subpar video, with oversaturated colors and rainbow effect

customer_reviews.title: no grid pattern like some other projectors -Small and portable (but not pocketable) ...
customer_reviews.text: PROS -Bright and colorful projected image -Clean high resolution picture, no grid pattern like some other projectors -Small and portable (but not pocketable) -Soft rubbery paint so it doesn’t scuff -Fairly good sounding speaker CONS -No stereo speakers -No projected image offset – so can only use at the edge of the table -Battery life is less than advertised (With speakers all the way up and a 2GB video file) -Accessories (tripod, remote control) feel cheap and flimsy SUMMARY A good little projector for less than $300 with some quirks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Little Projector
customer_reviews.text: This pico projector is the lowest priced 720P projector in the market and was the primary reason for my purchase. The image quality met my expectations - 150 lumens which is more than adequate with the lights off and most importantly the 1280x720 resolution means no mesh / grid lines or blocky text characters of lower resolution projectors. In addition I did not notice any of the “washing out” of the picture expressed by another reviewer. Perhaps the other reviewer was watching near a light source / sunlight? In summary a great little device and a great upgrade from the Brookstone pico projector.

customer_reviews.title: it stays relatively cool, which is essential when you've got this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Mount this sucker up to the head-board of your bed, and be prepared to kiss productivity as you know it, goodbye. It's light, and has a decent-quality picture. Most importantly, it stays relatively cool, which is essential when you've got this thing mounted up for a mind-blowing "Netflix and chill" session in you bed. Only complaint: sound quality is a bit inconsistent. Occasionally it will hiss and make static sounds, plugged or unplugged from its AUX output.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Small, bright and love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for those who are looking for small, lightweight and portable with onboard battery. I can't see myself using it very often but cannot wait to use it during my camping trip next week. The main menu setting is a bit weird with the black background but once you're connected to a video source, the projection is extremely clear for its size. Best bang for your buck for a 720P HD projector. Can't wait until 1080P eventually comes out!!!
customer_reviews.author: see yang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my Aaxa ST200! I spent two months researching,reading reviews,and shopping both in store and online. I am extremely pleased with this projector. I always read reviews before making an online purchase, but I feel that this projector deserved way more credit. Sound and picture are rich, considering its size and lumens. Attached are pictures and the image projected is roughly 135". These pictures doesn't do justice.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb C.

customer_reviews.title: Big image.
customer_reviews.text: Quite bright, VERY wide. Clean image. Lens is clean to edge. Battery would be cool, if it lasted longer. All such devices should have 2+ hours of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Basilphart

customer_reviews.title: pleased with the quality so far
customer_reviews.text: pleased with the quality so far... it projects clearly especially in low light rooms. The product arrived as listed on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jaisi

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Projector, couple issues
customer_reviews.text: This projector is a good projector, especially for the price. Good image quality, high resolution for a low price, and is well built. The issues I found were 1) While it's small, it does not fit in your pocket and 2) the brightness isn't as good as I'd like it to be in brighter room conditions, but works well in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Toh

customer_reviews.title: Just avoid it all together.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap projector and the build quality is just not there. The specs look good but if you can't use it, why spend the money. I would not recommend it to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product but no instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in the market for a portable projector for quite some time and I’m glad I came across this ST200. The projector offers great value for the price as you cannot really find anything under $300 with 720P resolution. I’m taking 1 star off for not coming with an instruction manual inside but the projector is pretty easy and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: tchylo

customer_reviews.title: The battery life also isn't very good. Other than that
customer_reviews.text: Projector works well for my purpose. The memory card slot is loose and my card actually fell inside the projector. I have to open it up to remove the card. The battery life also isn't very good. Other than that, the throw ratio is great and the timer on/off works,
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for some uses.
customer_reviews.text: This pico projector is not going to be useful as a home theater component. However it works fine as a portable projector for travel or occasional use. I use it as an art projector so I can outline subjects from a large library of my photographs. It has the perfect brightness for this application and accepts jpegs from a memory stick which is the way I use it. Much cheaper and brighter than other art projectors I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Collector

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough for my use
customer_reviews.text: Not bright enough to use for presentations. If your looking for business use then go for a 3000 lumen projector.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B Kowalsky

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much has to be almost zero light in the room for this thing to work.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

product_meta.title: AAXA ST200 HD 1280 x 720 Resolution LED Pico Projector, 150 Lumens, Short Throw, 60 Minute Battery, 15,000 Hour LEDs - KP-350-01
product_meta.description:
The AAXA ST200 is a true 720P (1280x700) native resolution pico projector featuring short-throw optics that displays larger images at shorter distances. The ST200 LED Pico Projector incorporates a solid-state light-source with a life-span of 15,000 hours and is a true mobile powerhouse featuring a 60-minute lithium ion battery and an onboard media player capable of producing digital pictures and supporting video playback.

An array of inputs complements the media player: HDMI, micro SD, USB, AV-RCA, and VGA. The AAXA ST200 LED Pico Projector is a compact and sleek pocket projector measuring only 5.5" x 3.8" x 1.3" and weighing only 0.7lbs. With the LED light-source, the ST200 is energy efficient as well - consuming only 20 watts on DC power. Other input / output options include video input and a 3.5mm headphone jack.

Connectivity with multimedia devices
The ST200 can connect to many media devices including: iPod, iPhone, iPad, VHS players, DVD players, smart phones, cameras, video game consoles and other peripherals with ease.
*Apps on smart phones require video out capabilities to be displayed with the ST200.
feature_bullets: 150 Lumen LCoS Optical Engine (Short Throw) with 15,000 Hour LED Light Source
HDMI, Mini-VGA, MicroSD, USB, and AV Inputs, Onboard 60+ Minute Battery + Media Player (Video, Picture, Music, and Text)
Projects up to 100" image (in low-light conditions)
Refer the user manual available under 'Warranty & Support'
